item.title: ‘No Idea Who Voted’: GA County Official Says She Was Forced To Certify Election Without Crucial Docs
item.description: 'The thing missing was clearly the most important thing.'

item.title: Americans Must Not Confuse ‘Healthier’ With ‘Healthy’
item.description: Foods depleted of all kinds of estrogenic additives might be better for us but that doesn't suddenly make boxes of sugar health foods.

item.title: Is ‘The Wild Robot’ A Wholesome Family Film Or Transhumanist Propaganda?
item.description: Parents should talk to their children about what makes humans unique and beautiful and warn them to be wary of anyone seeking to demote humanity from ...

item.title: Every Attack Trump Survived Will Be Deployed Against His Appointees, Successors, And Voters
item.description: Trump is simply the current target of the left's rage. That rage can be directed at any American regardless of his power or position.

item.title: Abolishing The Department Of Education Is Just The First Step In Fixing American Schools
item.description: Trump's hope is that Linda McMahon will work to eliminate the Department of Education altogether — but then the hard work starts.
